short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Medikit extension allows any applications to create EHEALTH session.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Medikit extension allows any applications to create EHEALTH session by using the Belgium Identity Card or the certificate provided by EHEALTH.

The session is valid for 24 hours and is used by applications to access to the EHEALTH services in a secured way (for example : Prescriber etc ...)

For more information about EHEALTH you can refer to this website : https://ehealth.fgov.be/ehealthplatform/fr.
